name: color-classifier
description: Classify the color along the reference color.

scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run demo:watch
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:js && npm run demo:build
scripts.build:js: NODE_ENV=production rollup -i src/color-classifier.js -o color-classifier.js -c && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o color-classifier.min.js --comments -- color-classifier.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=development npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:test
scripts.demo:build: npm run demo:build:js && npm run demo:build:sass
scripts.demo:build:js: browserify -e demo/src/js/entry.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] ] | uglifyjs > demo/bundle.js
scripts.demo:build:sass: node-sass demo/src/sass/ -o demo/ && postcss --use autoprefixer demo/*.css -d demo/
scripts.demo:watch: npm run demo:server & npm run demo:watch:js & npm run demo:watch:sass
scripts.demo:watch:js: watchify -e demo/src/js/entry.js -o demo/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] ]

author: tsuyoshiwada
